p: Modern research has proved that Nigella sativa is very useful because it is effective against almost all diseases of a human being. It is widely used as an antioxidant, antifungal, antibacterial, antispasmodic, antidiabetic, analgesic, anticarcinogenic and mutagenic agent, hepatoprotective agent. Nigella sativa, also possesses immune modulatory properties, nephroprotective & neuroprotective activity ( Nazir et al., 2018)
